DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose study meet CMS mandate Coverage Evidence Development requirement National Coverage Determination Leadless Pacemakers apply Medtronic Micra device . The study use administrative claim data Medicare population implant single-chamber ventricular pacemaker
DOC.brief_title: Longitudinal Coverage With Evidence Development Study Micra Leadless Pacemakers
DOC.detailed_description: Micra CED study study Medicare beneficiary population implant single-chamber ventricular pacemaker , execute analyze administrative claim data . The study consist two primary objective : estimate : ( 1 ) acute overall complication rate ( 2 ) 2-year survival rate patient implant Micra leadless pacemaker . As part secondary objective study , comparative analysis Micra leadless pacemaker single-chamber ventricular transvenous pacemaker conduct .
DOC.criteria: • Medicare beneficiary implant leadless pacemaker ( CPT 0387T ICD10 PCS 02HK3NZ ) study start date include study . • Medicare beneficiary implant full system singlechamber ventricular transvenous pacemaker ( CPT 33207 ICD10 PCS 0JH605Z 0JH604Z 02HK3JZ ) study start date . • None
